      • getTimetable

        @RequestMapping("/timetable/{year}/{week}")
public java.lang.String getTimetable​(@PathVariable("year")
                                     java.lang.String year,
                                     @PathVariable("week")
                                     java.lang.String week,
                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This method renders the timetable page based on given year and date
        Parameters:
        year - The string of year in url. The value 0 means current date
        week - The string of week in url. The value 0 means current date
        model - The Thymeleaf model object
        Returns:
        The string "timetable"(template name)
